name: Ahn-Crop Invader
oracle_text:
As long as it's your turn, Ahn-Crop Invader has first strike.
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Ahn-Crop Invader gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Give me a crew like this one and I'd rule any sea I sailed."
—Angrath

name: Aid the Fallen
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "I never liked you. Now get up—we have a fight to finish."

name: Arboreal Grazer
oracle_text:
Reach
When Arboreal Grazer enters the battlefield, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"We fight to stop a tyrant, but we also fight for the gentle creatures who have no concept of what befalls their world."
—Vivien Reid

name: Arlinn's Wolf
oracle_text: Arlinn's Wolf can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor_text:
"If you don't speak wolf, allow me to translate: 'One step closer and I'll rip out your throat.'"
—Arlinn Kord

name: Ashiok's Skulker
oracle_text: {3}{U}: Ashiok's Skulker can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"Fear writhes and whispers in the shadows of your mind. It is the enemy you always knew would come."
—Ashiok

name: Aven Eternal
oracle_text:
Flying
When Aven Eternal enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text:
"I've never seen the firemane angels so anxious."
—Tajic

name: Band Together
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.
flavor_text: In times of peril, the vision the ancient paruns had for their city comes into focus.

name: Banehound
oracle_text: Lifelink, haste
flavor_text:
"I wish I could train a pack of them for hunting in the undercity. But I'd never dare turn my back, and I hate to think what I'd have to feed them."
—Zhosmir, urban huntmaster

name: Battlefield Promotion
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Welcome to the Legion. You saved a district—now let's go save the world."

name: Blindblast
oracle_text:
Blindblast deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good."
—Jaya Ballard

name: Bloom Hulk
oracle_text: When Bloom Hulk enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text:
"Tread upon these flower beds at your own peril."
—Emmara

name: Bulwark Giant
oracle_text: When Bulwark Giant enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
flavor_text:
"Where did she come from? More importantly, are there more like her?"
—Gideon Jura

name: Burning Prophet
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Burning Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then scry 1.
flavor_text: "This day will end in death, but not the one you hoped for. This day will end in victory, but not the one you expected."

name: Callous Dismissal
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text:
"They make it clear we are nothing to them."
—Lavinia

name: Centaur Nurturer
oracle_text:
When Centaur Nurturer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "I call upon the vigor of the grasses, the hopes of the flowers, and the dreams of the trees."

name: Chainwhip Cyclops
oracle_text: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"You say this Tenth District, not Rubblebelt. But where smash happen, that Rubblebelt. Rubblebelt state of mind."
—Urgdar, cyclops philosopher

name: Chandra's Pyrohelix
oracle_text: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
flavor_text:
"Now that I've dealt with your little toys, I can focus on the real problem: you."
—Chandra Nalaar, to Dovin Baan

name: Charity Extractor
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: "War or no war, your donations are due, as always."

name: Charmed Stray
oracle_text:
Lifelink
When Charmed Stray enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control named Charmed Stray.
flavor_text:
"There's something peculiar about the cats today."
—Janoc, Tin Street tinker

name: Contentious Plan
oracle_text:
Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Niv-Mizzet had perfected a plan, but he had no control over the mortal minds who had to agree to implement it.

name: Courage in Crisis
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: "Thanks to my father, I know how to fight. He also showed me why I must."

name: Crush Dissent
oracle_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text:
"All I ask is complete obedience."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Davriel's Shadowfugue
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Shadows coiled around the witness's mind. Then the moment vanished, leaving only the sting of its loss.

name: Defiant Strike
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text:
"For every inch of land they take from us, we take it back or we burn it. Give them nothing."
—Aurelia

name: Desperate Lunge
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Ravnica held its breath as the hero of the resistance—their last hope—flew through the sky, his dark sword ready to strike a god.

name: Divine Arrow
oracle_text: Divine Arrow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Ravnica's defenders watched in horror as Oketra's shot pierced the body of the pegasus. Gideon tumbled through the air, Blackblade in hand.

name: Duskmantle Operative
oracle_text: Duskmantle Operative can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: Gideon eyed the Dimir emissary warily. "Could your agents slip inside Bolas's citadel?" The figure met his gaze with icy resolve. "We already have."

name: Enforcer Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"A company of infantry is trapped behind the lines. We need to strike hard and fast to free them, or the casualties will be horrific. Send the griffins."
—Tajic

name: Erratic Visionary
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"

name: Forced Landing
oracle_text: Put target creature with flying on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: The druid knew only one spell, a charm to encourage rapid plant growth. When airborne Eternals invaded her arboretum, she had to get creative.

name: Gateway Plaza
oracle_text:
Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Guild leaders focused their magic on the portal scar. Where the Chamber perished, a parun could be reborn.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Sometimes Mowu is content to gnaw on a bone. Sometimes he wants the whole skeleton."
—Jiang Yanggu

name: Gideon's Sacrifice
oracle_text: Choose a creature or planeswalker you control. All damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to the chosen permanent instead (if it's still on the battlefield).
flavor_text: To Liliana's surprise, the cost of betraying Bolas did not fall on her.

name: Goblin Assailant
flavor_text: What he lacks in patience, intelligence, empathy, lucidity, hygiene, ability to follow orders, self-regard, and discernible skills, he makes up for in sheer chaotic violence.

name: Goblin Assault Team
oracle_text:
Haste
When Goblin Assault Team dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: Under the veneer of the various guilds, each goblin has the same basic need: to run screaming at the enemy and hit a bunch of stuff.

name: Grim Initiate
oracle_text:
First strike
When Grim Initiate dies, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: Beneath each gleaming mineral shell rots a once-proud warrior of Amonkhet.

name: Guild Globe
oracle_text:
When Guild Globe enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Guild Globe: Add two mana of different colors.
flavor_text:
"Hopefully Ravnica will prove harder to break."
—Karn

name: Guildpact Informant
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Guildpact Informant deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: "Of course you're being followed!"

name: Heartfire
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or planeswalker.
Heartfire deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The mage looked within and realized there was still one piece of fuel to burn.

name: Herald of the Dreadhorde
oracle_text: When Herald of the Dreadhorde dies, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: Amonkhet's dead flowed into a new world in service to their God-Pharaoh.

name: Honor the God-Pharaoh
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards. Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: In life, they revered a diverse pantheon of gods. Now they revere only the God-Pharaoh.

name: Invading Manticore
oracle_text: When Invading Manticore enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text:
"Fall back! You are no match for this."
—Samut

name: Iron Bully
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Iron Bully enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Why would someone have built ... wait, never mind. Send it to the front lines!"
—Commander Grozdan

name: Ironclad Krovod
flavor_text:
"We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?"
—Gideon Jura

name: Jaya's Greeting
oracle_text: Jaya's Greeting deals 3 damage to target creature. Scry 1.
flavor_text: "We have visitors? Well, it'd be rude not to give them a traditional Keral Keep welcome."

name: Kasmina's Transmutation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.
flavor_text:
"Hop away now, little Eternal. Go eat some flies."
—Kasmina

name: Kaya's Ghostform
oracle_text:
Enchant creature or planeswalker you control
When enchanted permanent dies or is put into exile, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: The Eternals found some sparks to be quite slippery.

name: Kiora's Dambreaker
oracle_text: When Kiora's Dambreaker enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text:
"When your enemy flees, send the sea to pursue them."
—Kiora

name: Kraul Stinger
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text: He listens to the sounds of battle filtering down from above, waiting for silence, waiting for his time to claim the streets.

name: Kronch Wrangler
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Kronch Wrangler.
flavor_text: Looking over two city blocks of destruction, he could only cackle with pride.

name: Law-Rune Enforcer
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Tap target creature with mana value 2 or greater.
flavor_text:
"See that no one enters or leaves New Prahv today. And notify me at once of any Planeswalker activity."
—Dovin Baan

name: Lazotep Behemoth
flavor_text:
"I know I should be more concerned. But a big, blue zombie-potamus from beyond the stars? This is what they're invading us with?"
—Mileva, Boros legionnaire

name: Lazotep Reaver
oracle_text: When Lazotep Reaver enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.

name: Loxodon Sergeant
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Loxodon Sergeant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: His voice is both war horn and rallying cry, a trumpeting call that stirs even the faintest heart.

name: Makeshift Battalion
oracle_text: Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.
flavor_text: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.

name: Mana Geode
oracle_text:
When Mana Geode enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"I don't care if it's an all-powerful relic or a street vendor's lucky charm. If it brings you courage, wear it."
—Saheeli Rai

name: Martyr for the Cause
oracle_text: When Martyr for the Cause dies, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: "If I am to die in service, there is no more worthy fight than this."

name: Naga Eternal
flavor_text:
"I recognize that headdress. This one was feared even by her fellow initiates."
—Samut

name: Nahiri's Stoneblades
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The ancient Planeswalkers Sorin and Nahiri battled across Ravnica, their blows cutting as deep as their grudge.

name: New Horizons
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When New Horizons enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

name: No Escape
oracle_text:
Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
Scry 1.
flavor_text: Jace surmised that they were walking into Bolas's trap. He felt no joy in being right.

name: Ob Nixilis's Cruelty
oracle_text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: Trapped on Ravnica with no affection for either side, Ob Nixilis sought gratification in random acts of torment.

name: Orzhov Guildgate
oracle_text:
Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
flavor_text:
"So much wealth. So much splendor. So much temptation to believe the gilded lie."
—Kaya

name: Pollenbright Druid
oracle_text:
When Pollenbright Druid enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

name: Pouncing Lynx
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Pouncing Lynx has first strike.
flavor_text: "I don't understand. He's normally so well behaved!"

name: Primordial Wurm
flavor_text: Elite training, single-minded devotion, and lazotep coating help only so much for invaders who are fundamentally bite-sized.

name: Prismite
oracle_text: {2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: It didn't budge when the portal opened, nor when the ancient gods emerged. It came to life only when all ten guilds came together to face a common threat.

name: Raging Kronch
oracle_text: Raging Kronch can't attack alone.
flavor_text:
"Seeing so much easy prey makes her crazy. See how she snorts and drools?"
—Dhuuz, kronch wrangler

name: Relentless Advance
oracle_text: Amass 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: They approach in formation, every movement efficient and sure. They halt, listen, and then press on in silent unison.

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Yes, nature is stronger. You don't see little buildings sprouting on trees."
—Emmara

name: Rising Populace
oracle_text: Whenever another creature or planeswalker you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rising Populace.
flavor_text: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.

name: Saheeli's Silverwing
oracle_text:
Flying
When Saheeli's Silverwing enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target opponent's library.
flavor_text: "Track the source of those thopters," Saheeli told her creation. "And feel free to snack on as many as you want."

name: Samut's Sprint
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.
flavor_text: Samut's war was intensely personal. Every hour she faced enemies she once loved as friends and horrors she once revered as gods.

name: Sarkhan's Catharsis
oracle_text: Sarkhan's Catharsis deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "You once brought havoc to my home and ruined my mind. I'm here to return the favor, Bolas."

name: Shriekdiver
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}: Shriekdiver gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"It's faster than we are. Draw its attention while the Ledev take aim!"
—Shauntal, Boros legionnaire

name: Simic Guildgate
oracle_text:
Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text:
"Mystery is beauty. Within the unknown we plumb revelation."
—Vannifar

name: Sky Theater Strix
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Sky Theater Strix gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Courier owls joined the fray, attacking the Dreadhorde with a viciousness usually reserved for mail thieves.

name: Snarespinner
oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever Snarespinner blocks a creature with flying, Snarespinner gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Let's lure the drakes to the webs over the Samok Stand. Keep the spiders content."
—Aurelia

name: Sorin's Thirst
oracle_text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"I see you're out of the wall."
—Nahiri

name: Spark Harvest
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.

name: Spark Reaper
oracle_text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I know they're unstoppable fighters created to harvest souls—it's just they're so rude about it."
—Kaya

name: Spellgorger Weird
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Spellgorger Weird.
flavor_text: Freed from their respective labs, the two weirds formed a partnership, feeding on the arcane energies of war.

name: Spellkeeper Weird
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Spellkeeper Weird: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: They worked well as a team, but they knew it couldn't last forever.

name: Steady Aim
oracle_text: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+4 and gains reach until end of turn.
flavor_text: The archer's heart broke seeing her compatriots die far below, but she held position until the enemy was in range.

name: Stealth Mission
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. That creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"What they don't know will definitely hurt them."
—Lazav

name: Tamiyo's Epiphany
oracle_text: Scry 4, then draw two cards.
flavor_text: Tamiyo wished only to observe the war, but she soon realized neutrality was not an option.

name: Teferi's Time Twist
oracle_text: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If it enters the battlefield as a creature, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "The safest place for you is not now."

name: Teyo's Lightshield
oracle_text: When Teyo's Lightshield enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: Teyo gifted his shields to as many allies as possible, knowing he could not always be there to protect them himself.

name: Thunder Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Thunder Drake.
flavor_text: The arrival of the Planar Bridge caused eddies in the aether, creating some entirely new species while transforming others.

name: Thundering Ceratok
oracle_text:
Trample
When Thundering Ceratok enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I thought this was a civilized plane. How are there so many feral beasts?"
—Dovin Baan

name: Tithebearer Giant
oracle_text: When Tithebearer Giant enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"I've always said full war chests win wars, but I didn't mean by bashing enemy skulls with them."
—Teysa

name: Toll of the Invasion
oracle_text:
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Topple the Statue
oracle_text:
Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.

name: Totally Lost
oracle_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: At least this was better than that week at the Juri Revue.

name: Trusted Pegasus
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Trusted Pegasus attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Would you give your life to save this world?" Gideon murmured. The pegasus snorted and spread wide its mighty wings.

name: Turret Ogre
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapult.

name: Unlikely Aid
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"No one will ever ride me again, Gideon. Expect no further favors."
—Rakdos

name: Vampire Opportunist
oracle_text: {6}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "I think I cracked a fang."

name: Vivien's Grizzly
oracle_text: {3}{G}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature or planeswalker card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, put it on the bottom of your library.

name: Vraska's Finisher
oracle_text: When Vraska's Finisher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: "You might have pleaded your case with my queen earlier. Now I am here, and it is far too late."

name: Wall of Runes
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text:
"It's strangely satisfying seeing an undead killing machine from another world standing befuddled in front of a wall of text."
—Lavinia

name: Wanderer's Strike
oracle_text: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text:
"Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it."
—Lavinia

name: Wardscale Crocodile
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"The Eternals had to endure Amonkhet's five trials. Let's see if they can pass the Trial of Ravnica."
—Jace Beleren

name: War Screecher
oracle_text:
Flying
{5}{W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Soaring over Vitu-Ghazi, New Prahv, and Orzhova, the Conclave's trained falcons provided critical intelligence.
